overview: Four gay themed short films:  1.Frühstück, - Young love in Berlin: speed, anonymity and  3 million people making a wish.  2. Frende - Johannes has found a new friend: Marco, the tough guy who seems to know no bounds.  3. Sommerkleid (Une robe d'été (1996))- That's summer... Sebastien loves Sheila. Lucia loves the boys. And Frederic really just wants to sunbathe.  4. Hormone und andere Dämonen  (Hormoner og andre demoner (2001)) - All sorts of confusion surrounding a queer pair of siblings and their desire for the same man, sweet blond Lukas...
title: Erstes Mal - Schwule Kurzfilme
